website_summaries.verdict: A great value for very concentrated shampoo (10:1 ratio) that has many of the same ingredients as much pricier versions.
pros: Leaves a subtle clean and minty scent while deodorizing event the smelliest animals
A formula with aloe and other botanicals that keeps coats shiny
cons: Some users dislike the scent, but this seems largely due to personal preference

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional groomer and wanted something inexpensive to try to add into my products....very disappointed, the smell is mild, somewhat minty, but does not leave the pets smelling fresh even without dilution. I also used on my personal horses and it worked fine for my bay, however my paint with tons of white it didn’t even cut the the dirt..... Won’t waste my money again.
customer_reviews.author: elisabeth alley

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain Good product!
customer_reviews.text: With two very big dogs I was tired of paying $8 a small bottle for pet shampoo. I purchased this 1gallon concentrate to save some money in the long run. I diluted to to 10:1 mix and the product was still pretty strong so i went closer to 15:1. No issues with the dogs skin, smell is very gentle and easy on the nose (after diluted), dogs fur is soft and shiney. If any adverse effects happen I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Mhouser7

customer_reviews.title: Great Low-Cost Dog Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Great price, smells nice, made my older lab/shepherd mix super soft and fluffy. He has struggled with skin issues and excess oil production his whole life, he didn't experience any issues for about a month after a bath with this shampoo. It's not the longest he's gone without a hot spot or some other issue, but it's noteworthy :) Lathers really well so you only need a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Relatively inexpensive, but product is lackluster as well.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find this to work out much different than Dollar Tree's shampoo. It has a stronger scent when using, but I can't smell it after the bath, even if not diluted as directed. I'd like to have at least a little scent. And no, diluting it as directed did not work for me. I made it significantly stronger and have been spraying it, but am thinking about reducing the dilution even more and pouring it on. I get tired of breathing it in when spraying as it's a bit irritating. Recommended dilution is about like water with a little soap. Will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can dilute this however I want. I can use it full strength if it’s been a while since I bathed my dogs or they have something stuck in their fur. I can dilute it quite a bit to spread it out further for my money when I don’t need thick shampoo to do the job. Works great, whatever way! The only difference is, if you don’t dilute it, it’s pretty thick so it sticks to the fur better when you need to eat it soak.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie

customer_reviews.title: Aloe Concentrate Shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around for shampoo at the most economical price/quantity and chose this concentrate. It is wonderful. Very aromatic Aloe fragrance; clean shimmering finish to hair. Also use for body wash. Shipping is almost as much as the purchase price but it is a full gallon of fluid measure. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: proto::

customer_reviews.title: Dazzling shine
customer_reviews.text: I diluted 50% and bathed our chocolate lab. This is a fantastic value. The scent is strong while bathing her, but was completely netural after completely dry. No more dog smell. This stuff was like magic! We have never seen her coat so smooth, soft and shiny. We are now loyal customers of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As excellent as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is great shampoo. I give my very large parapalegic dog a full submersion bath everyday and many shampoos dry out his skin and coat. This aloe shampoo has left his coat so soft and his skin isn't bothering him as much. He's not gotten many baths with it yet, but I think after trying many others, this one I will purchase again. Other shampoos have said their strength is 50:1 or close to that, but it never is. This shampoo states 10:1 and it seems about accurate, and also what those 'stronger' shampoos really are. The price is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for sheep, alpaca, angora, mohair, and llama, wool/fiber.
customer_reviews.text: A little mixed with water goes a long way!!! I bought this for cleaning wool/fiber after shearing. It gets the lanolin, pee, dirt, mud, grease, and every thing out. I mix 1/4 cup in approximately 8-10 gallons of warm water. The nasty, dirty, white fleeces come out white after 5 minutes sitting in the bath!!! This shampoo is fabulous. If it does so well on livestock fleece/fiber, I dont see why it wont do as well on any pet.
customer_reviews.author: Shanti

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I run a small groom shop and groom all breeds and coat styles of dogs and cats. Smalls great and delivers a silky soft glowing coat! Have gotten a lot more compliments on my canine coats since switching to this shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon. Benjamins

customer_reviews.title: Don't Do It.
customer_reviews.text: I got this shampoo as a fill in for when I was running low in case I ran out of the shampoo I usually use in my shop- As soon as I opened it the smell was not agreeable- a sort of mix between pepto bismol and toxic chemical. It barely makes suds, & It is full of stuff like laurel sulfate etc- Wish I had not spent the small amount I did, cuz even as a last resort I won't use it. My advise: Spend the extra ten or so dollars for a nicer product!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It lasts such a long time! It works great on all dogs! I’ve babysat dogs and groomed and have used this on many different breeds! I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Marullo

customer_reviews.title: It is great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is thick!! It smells great. It is very concentrated and you must dilute it. It leaves the fur very soft and nice shine. I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Not as concentrated and thick as others
customer_reviews.text: I have used Nature’s Choice shampoo for years and it is thicker and more concentrated. A thick shampoo helps with applying shampoo to the underside of a large long haired dog as it does not run through your fingers and get lost down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Walker

customer_reviews.title: Makes 10 gallons of shampoo!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize it’s concentrated! You can make 10 gallons of shampoo out of this one! Don’t use it concentrated, it’ll take for ever to come out and leave everything feeling dehydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very lite minty sent. Suds up good if you use enough. Wont buy it again. Not worth the cheapness. I'm a professional groomer and thought I would try it for the money. When you have clients coming every month with their pets and asking you if you used a different shampoo because their pet didnt smell as nice or the cleanliness of their pet didnt last as long in between groomings then you know it's not a viable product for your salon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft fur and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this shampoo. The wintergreen minty smell is nice and my dogs were very soft after they were bathed. I will definitely be ordering this again (if I ever run out) :)
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for my dogs and other animals that I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for my dogs and other animals that I bath and my boarding kennel they seem to like it and I like the smell and it does a great job of cleaning their coats thank you for the product this is the second bottle order from you and I will keep ordering from you in the future sincerely Mr. Tyler.
customer_reviews.author: W. M. TYLER

customer_reviews.title: Smeels nice, leaves coat soft
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say other than the shampoo works great. Smells good and leaves the dogs soft and fluffy. You should note that our dogs are soft coated wheatens so they have hair not fur.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: OK, I am a thrifty person. Sorry. I have used this shampoo for years on ME! Works fine and I still have a full head of hair at 64. This is my second gallon and I like it. I have never gotten fleas but I do tend to howl at the moon.
customer_reviews.author: H. Winters

customer_reviews.title: i love this product because it foams up easily so you ...
customer_reviews.text: i love this product because it foams up easily so you are saving a lot.. the scent is subtle
customer_reviews.author: Jose Aurellano Jr

customer_reviews.title: Maybe don't dilute.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Good scent. Even a good consistency. Now it's advertised as being able to dilute it with 1 part this and 9 parts water, and you can but it becomes watery. If you want it to be more gel like don't dilute it.
customer_reviews.author: victor w bennett Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Eww
customer_reviews.text: Smells gross and my dog had the eyes red after I gave her a bath so I guess it is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Romina R

customer_reviews.title: It was the worst $13 I've ever spent
customer_reviews.text: As a groomer I was excited when I found a gallon of shampoo for $13. It was the worst $13 I've ever spent. It does not clean it just masks the odor of the dog with a worse overpowering smell of spearmint. No. Just , no!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Will recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to try this on my Yorkies, I am an avid user of Wild Animal Products. I tried this Shampoo and it cleaned up my pack of dogs very nicely. The smell was not bad and it really cleaned their bodies and it did not seem to dry out their coats. I use Wild animal silk n silk for conditioner though. Very good combination for me and my pack of Yorkies! I will recommend this to my clients.
customer_reviews.author: MinnesotaYorkieTails

customer_reviews.title: This is a lot of shampoo.. it works ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of shampoo.. it works well, but when diluted it's a bit water. However it has to be diluted bc it's too strong if it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Kasi

customer_reviews.title: Leaves coat soft and silky, but smells like Pepto Bismouth
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well, lathers well, leaves coat feeling soft and silky, just needs a new smell. Thankfully scent does not last on the dog after drying. I'm a professional groomer and have tried many shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo ever
customer_reviews.text: Best pet shampoo that I have ever used And love the smell Also the fleas hate it. I think it really kills most of them! Will be buying more when I run out it is highly consecrated a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Troll

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $
customer_reviews.text: Not a concentrate. Need to use excessive amount to bath a malti poo. 1/4 of it went to wash the german shepard. Not saving any $ in the long run. It doesnt even doa good job of making them smell clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs dug it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs seem to like it & the price was excellent
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great dog shampoo and not perfumey
customer_reviews.text: I wash my 11yo Aussie Shepherd about once a month or when needed and I’m still on my original bottle.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Okay smell.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased that such a small amount of soap went a long way and cleaned so well. Only downside was that I was expecting a mild sweet smell since it said aloe and oatmeal but actually smells very minty like toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be aware - horrible smell!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I guess i.m stuck with this shampoo now, but it smells horrific... It cleans ok, but the way it smells i just cant get over it. Definitely needs improvement in this area!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ania G.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like pesto bismol
customer_reviews.text: This is good for really dirty dogs for a deep clean but smells weird
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Only used once smell fine not great but I don’t like over powering smell low suds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just no
customer_reviews.text: The smell is like a mouth wash and the dog wasn't clean after . Just still felt dirty, I wanted a good natural shampoo this wasn't it
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Wintergreen fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This has a wintergreen fragrance. If you like that,, this is for you. I sent it back--I don't want my dog smelling Like Pepto Bismol.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: seemed to make it worse. I wish I could go back to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the wintermint smell. Also did nothing to wash out skunk odor, seemed to make it worse. I wish I could go back to my old trusted brand but it’s not sold anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: concentrate so a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: Sent it to a shelter after Florence and it worked very nicely. Very clean dogs. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sharon herzog

customer_reviews.title: I have clean pups again!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Shampoo has a spearmint smell that is very pleasing. The soap sudsed up very well and I even diluted the shampoo 3:1.
customer_reviews.author: Steffie U.

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo and you can not beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo and you can not beat the price. I have multiple long coated dogs and this shampoo leaves their coats shiny and very manageable. It also leaves my hands feeling great. They are not dried out at all. It dilutes well too or you can use it full strength. I am not crazy about the smell, it is minty. It is strong when you open the bottle but the smell does linger on yur dog. Hightly recommend this shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Holley

customer_reviews.title: Soft Coat, Great Smell.
customer_reviews.text: Leaves horse's coat soft and smells great. We use it at our whole facility to give our horses weekly baths. We also use it on the barn dogs, too. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Smells so gross and doesn’t leave a dog smelling clean.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Just used this for the first time & really like it. Don't need a lot & it seemed ...
customer_reviews.text: Just used this for the first time & really like it. Don't need a lot & it seemed to help dog's coat which was beginning to feel a little dry. Love the pump as it makes things so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Shampoo smells neutral. Love how it removes all the dirt from my dog. Wish it had a stronger last smell but I have noticed a difference in the other shampoos I’ve bought at petco or petsmart. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: sergio rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Minty freshness lol
customer_reviews.text: I liked that there's enough of shampoo in this bottle to last a long time, I don't like how thin it is but it's fine because it still does the job. Smells great and I'm sure it's good for her skin.
customer_reviews.author: MzStar

customer_reviews.title: Keep this on in stock!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product at a very reasonable price. We keep it in stock!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, dogs love it too!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my dogs smelling great and it really gets foamy so I feel as if they are getting a good wash. The dogs seem to like the smell a bit too much and tend to try to lick themselves or the others that are getting washed. Not sure why but I just keep an eye out to make sure they don't.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo does the job well! I was using an expensive dogs shampoo but they discontinued it and I found this product on Amazon. Makes the coat of my black dogs clean and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Dan V

customer_reviews.title: Thank you next
customer_reviews.text: Not a good dog grooming type shampoo. I used it for a few weeks, I’m not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Simple Green
customer_reviews.text: This product smells just like simple green cleaner. Don’t waste your money. Doesn’t smell fresh, it smells like cleaning chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works really well and smells nice but not too strong
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and smells nice but not too strong. I have a standard poodle and a doberman and a dirt yard so I do a lot of bathing. My standard has very sensitive skin and she has had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Neill

customer_reviews.title: Okay product for such a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good basic shampoo.. kind of smells strange like medicated or an odd mint. Doesn’t irritate my dogs skin though so it’s good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Grimmett

customer_reviews.title: Smells good no allergic reactions
customer_reviews.text: smells good, dogs got no allergic reaction and the fur is nice soft and easy to comb afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Worldofdreams

customer_reviews.title: Good value! I use a barbecue liquid dispenser obtained ...
customer_reviews.text: Good value! I use a barbecue liquid dispenser obtained at a home store to mix and use on the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice smell to it and good to use on anything horses and my dogs
customer_reviews.author: Glozano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dogs that shed a lot and has dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Our dog started having very dry skin. I purchased this and within two uses her skin was no longer dry and she doesn’t shed hardly at all anymore. I love that it’s concentrated so we can put it in a spray bottle for convenience
customer_reviews.author: MDodd

customer_reviews.title: Mintlishous
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, smells funny- like yucky minty, but the price is right and the smell doesn't persist. I'm using it on myself and it is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: GG in MN

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo lathers up nicely and has a minty scent. Although I’m not overly impressed with the scent, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great , leaves the coat feeling soft and smelling great
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This stuff lathers up very well and there is lots! I have two large German Shepards and because of their thick, long, heavy fur, I had to bathe them weekly. With this shampoo, I have been able to bathe them every two weeks instead of one. Also, a lot of dog shampoos don't lather up very well, but this one does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo has such a nice smell and cleans very well! I have a golden that has allergies to everything and itches all the time. This shampoo has cut the itching way Down's!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Jauernic

customer_reviews.title: Decent but Menthol-ly
customer_reviews.text: The menthol smell isn't my favorite, but it gets the coat clean!
customer_reviews.author: Marina T Molinelli

customer_reviews.title: will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: not what i expected. i do not like the smell and it doesn't make my dogs smell like they have been bathed.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: As a groomer I really love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: As a groomer I really love this stuff, leaves the coat exceptionally soft and shiny! Great for really greasy and dirty dogs, it lathers very nicely. I've noticed it doesn't seem to dry skin out either. So far I'm a big fan of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Felisha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very very good shampoo for dogs. My dog's fur are so shiny after wash.
customer_reviews.author: GigiChloe528

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this and used it in my grooming shop. It still lathers when diluted. I like the smell but some may not. The smell does fade quickly however. It smells like wintergreen.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Good daily shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Good daily shampoo. Wintergreen scent. Does not break out my sensitive skin. Recommend. Good value size. Would buy again, but wish they had other scents available.
customer_reviews.author: Meri Kingsbury

customer_reviews.title: awsome for groomers
customer_reviews.text: im a dog groomer and i was looking for a shampoo thats good on dog's coat smell great and not so costly and I have definitely found it will be ordering it again!
customer_reviews.author: tahreah

customer_reviews.title: Not crazy about the smell but I am able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about the smell but I am able to overlook it because the shampoo cleans well and the ratio is incredible. A gallon goes a long way for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Clean minty scent. Not overwhelming. Great for the price. Lasts a long time. Will purchase again when i run out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good for Yorkie/Morkie hypoallergenic dogs
customer_reviews.text: Good for hypoallergenic dogs. Yourkie, morkie, poodle, Maltese, cocker spaniel, cockapoo, Bichon frise. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Lilstickadynamite

customer_reviews.title: very good value
customer_reviews.text: good shampoo and very good value, dilutes about 12-1 and still cleans great
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, soft, everyday shampoo. I like that it has Aloe Vera in it. Wonderful alternative to Medicated shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Little E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's concentrated and we mix it 1:10. I've got about 35 dogs. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: JJO

customer_reviews.title: Smells good.
customer_reviews.text: Well have this a while, it's really concentrated. Smells good.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shampoo for ME!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is excellent for really getting my hair clean (and my cats) and being gentle as well. A lot for the money! It arrived on time and in perfect condition.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It smells like 5 Gum mint. Its not the good kind of mint you want to smell like.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. I can use it to wash all ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I can use it to wash all of my animals safely and without lots of additives.

customer_reviews.title: Half the price of other professional concentrates, but just as good
customer_reviews.text: Good shampoo for a great price. I tried it because of the price, but the quality made me a repeat customer.

customer_reviews.title: ... quite abit to get a lather but it is fine.
customer_reviews.text: You have to use quite abit to get a lather but it is fine.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo for every type of skin. Love it and a great price

customer_reviews.title: Greatcshampoo for animal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product . Very good for dogs skin and coat. I will continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda J. Carter

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo S-T-I-N-K-S.. I have been asked by ...
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo S-T-I-N-K-S..I have been asked by clients to Please don't use it on they're dog..basically it is occupy'ing space in a cabinet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love to use it when cleaning my carpet at home.
customer_reviews.author: GERARDO ABUEG

customer_reviews.title: Its gentle
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is excellent. I have a mobile dog grooming business and this is the only shampoo I use on my clients. It cleans, deorderizes and leave them shiny and smelling great. Price is great also. There is nothing I don't like about it!
customer_reviews.author: camie crisp

customer_reviews.title: Nice shampoo and it smells good and it’s great for ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice shampoo and it smells good and it’s great for my dogs
customer_reviews.author: Helen Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shampoo is great for the price, and it helps get cigarette smoke smell off of my grooming customers!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used in a grooming salon, does not wash the dogs well.

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: The soap was open and all over in the box when delivered...so disappointing

customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional pet from of 17 years and this stuff is so gross. It smells like fake medicine and does nothing imo

customer_reviews.title: This is a good basic shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic shampoo. It has a strong spearmint smell. It doesn't linger but makes the coats look nice!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps with horses who are prone to allergies! Helps soothe their skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Benson

customer_reviews.title: It smells like wint-o-green lifesavers
customer_reviews.text: It smells like wint-o-green lifesavers. I don't like it. It lathers well and pets are clean but thats not how I want my pets to smell.

customer_reviews.title: This item has a strong scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very mouthwash like and is hard to rinse out.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Cleans well but not real fond of smell.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly. Our dog is clean, shiny and smells good. Great value. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: It works

customer_reviews.text: I love it ! Smell stays and completely cleans hair ! I will definitely buy this again 😍

product_meta.title: Aloe Concentrated Shampoo 1 Gallon
product_meta.description: Size:1 GallonAloe Advantage Concentrated Shampoo is professionally formulated to cleanse and condition the hair. Enriched with natural extracts, this all-purpose shampoo moisturizes damaged hair, while adding body and a healthy, lustrous shine.
feature_bullets: Enriched with aloe, may help restore moisture to damaged hair
No coat stripping detergents or dyes
